thoughts.text: The browse_website command did not return any useful information about the Brno Reservoir Trail. I will use the google command to find more information about the trail and plan my route accordingly.
thoughts.reasoning: Using the google command will allow me to easily access more information about the Brno Reservoir Trail and plan my route accordingly. This will help me ensure that I am adequately prepared for my adventure.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the google command to find more information about the Brno Reservoir Trail and plan my route accordingly
- Use this information to prepare for my adventure
thoughts.criticism: I need to make sure I am adequately prepared for the trip and not take unnecessary risks.
